excellent and engaging tower defence game  it has a perfect learning curve and you can experiment a lot and try different tactics out  the dlc adds long term challenge  you get more than the first campaign as standard and the follow up give unrelenting challenges   it is a bit old now but still stands up as a solid and endearing td game   much better than its sequel although that is a decent enough game with a steeper learning curve if you like tds then this is gold

ehhh  i think saying unique might be a bit much  but it is a decent tower defense title  you just need to enjoy the genre to enjoy this  not particularly the kind of game im often thrilled about and this isnt much of a different experience  but credit to where credit is due  its well made plays nicely and there were a few moments i thought i might actually like tower defense

this and defense grid 2 are simply the best tower defense games that i have found  i wish there was a way to randomize the alien waves so they are not always the same because that would improve replayability  still these games are worth every penny and probably the very best ones to try if its your first experience in td
